name: AVMovieWritingOptions
desc: A set of options to control the writing of a movie header to a destination URL.

items.name: static var addMovieHeaderToDestination: AVMovieWritingOptions
items.desc: The new movie header will overwrite any existing movie header.

items.name: static var truncateDestinationToMovieHeaderOnly: AVMovieWritingOptions
items.desc: The movie header overwrites all existing data and creates a pure reference movie file.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a movie writing options structure.
